Uses of Package
model

Packages that use model
Package
Description
controller
 
gui
 
model
 
  • Classes in model used by controller
    Class
    Description
    Account
    The class Account represents a generic account
    Card
    The class Card represents a generic Uno card
    Deck
    Represents a deck of playing cards.
    Discarded
    Discarded is a Stack subclass that represents a pile of discarded cards in a card game.
    Game
    The Game class represents a game in the UNO game.
    Player
    Represents a player in the game.
  • Classes in model used by gui
    Class
    Description
    Account
    The class Account represents a generic account
    Card
    The class Card represents a generic Uno card
    Card.Color
    The enumeration Color represents possible colors of Uno card
    Player
    Represents a player in the game.
  • Classes in model used by model
    Class
    Description
    Account
    The class Account represents a generic account
    AiPlayer
    The class AiPlayer extends the class Player and represents a generic virtual player in a card game.
    AiPlayer.Strategy
    The enumeration Strategy represents possible strategy of virtual player
    Card
    The class Card represents a generic Uno card
    Card.Color
    The enumeration Color represents possible colors of Uno card
    Card.Flipped
    An enumeration class representing the two possible states of a card being flipped.
    Card.Value
    The enum Value represents possible values of Uno card
    Card.Value.Flipped
    An enumeration class representing the two possible states of a card being flipped.
    Deck
    Represents a deck of playing cards.
    Discarded
    Discarded is a Stack subclass that represents a pile of discarded cards in a card game.
    Game.GameDirection
    The GameDirection enumeration represents the direction of play in the UNO game.
    Player
    Represents a player in the game.
